verses.verse: The lot<WH1486> for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> according to their families<WH4940> was to the border<WH1366> of Edom,<WH123> even to the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790> southward,<WH5045> at the uttermost part<WH7097> of the south.<WH8486>
Their south<WH5045> border<WH1366> was from the uttermost part<WH7097> of the Salt<WH4417> Sea,<WH3220> from the bay<WH3956> that looks<WH6437> southward;<WH5045>

and it went out<WH3318> southward<WH5045> of the ascent<WH5045> of Akrabbim,<WH4610> and passed<WH5674> along to Zin,<WH6790> and went up<WH5927> by the south of Kadesh Barnea,<WH6947> and passed<WH5674> along by Hezron,<WH2696> went up<WH5927> to Addar,<WH146> and turned about<WH5437> to Karka;<WH7173>

and it passed<WH5674> along to Azmon,<WH6111> went out<WH3318> at the brook<WH5158> of Egypt;<WH4714> and the border<WH1366> ended<WH8444> at the sea.<WH3220> This shall be your south<WH5045> border.<WH1366>

The east<WH6924> border<WH1366> was the Salt<WH4417> Sea,<WH3220> even to the end<WH7097> of the Jordan.<WH3383> The border<WH1366> of the north<WH6828> quarter<WH6285> was from the bay<WH3956> of the sea<WH3220> at the end<WH7097> of the Jordan.<WH3383>

The border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to Beth Hoglah,<WH1031> and passed<WH5674> along by the north<WH6828> of Beth Arabah;<WH1026> and the border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to the stone<WH68> of Bohan<WH932> the son<WH1121> of Reuben.<WH7205>

The border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to Debir<WH1688> from the valley<WH6010> of Achor,<WH5911> and so northward,<WH6828> looking<WH6437> toward Gilgal,<WH1537> that is over against<WH5227> the ascent<WH4608> of Adummim,<WH131> which is on the south side<WH5045> of the river.<WH5158> The border<WH1366> passed<WH5674> along to the waters<WH4325> of En Shemesh,<WH5885> and ended<WH8444> at En Rogel.<WH5883>

The border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> by the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011> to the side<WH3802> of the Jebusite<WH2983> southward<WH5045> (the same is Jerusalem<WH3389>); and the border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to the top<WH7218> of the mountain<WH2022> that lies before<WH6440> the valley<WH1516> of Hinnom<WH2011> westward,<WH3220> which is at the farthest part<WH7097> of the valley<WH6010> of Rephaim<WH7497> northward.<WH6828>

The border<WH1366> extended<WH8388> from the top<WH7218> of the mountain<WH2022> to the spring<WH4599> of the waters<WH4325> of Nephtoah,<WH5318> and went out<WH3318> to the cities<WH5892> of Mount<WH2022> Ephron;<WH6085> and the border<WH1366> extended<WH8388> to Baalah<WH1173> (the same is Kiriath Jearim<WH7157>);

and the border<WH1366> turned<WH5437> about from Baalah<WH1173> westward<WH3220> to Mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> and passed<WH5674> along to the side<WH3802> of Mount<WH2022> Jearim<WH3297> on the north<WH6828> (the same is Chesalon<WH3693>), and went down<WH3381> to Beth Shemesh,<WH1053> and passed along<WH5674> by Timnah;<WH8553>

and the border<WH1366> went out<WH3318> to the side<WH3802> of Ekron<WH6138> northward;<WH6828> and the border<WH1366> extended<WH8388> to Shikkeron,<WH7942> and passed along<WH5674> to Mount<WH2022> Baalah,<WH1173> and went out<WH3318> at Jabneel;<WH2995> and the goings out<WH3318> of the border<WH1366> were at the sea.<WH3220>
The west<WH3220> border<WH1366> was to the shore<WH5439> of the great<WH1419> sea.<WH3220> This is the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> according to their families.<WH4940>

To Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> he gave<WH5414> a portion<WH2506> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> according<WH413> to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh<WH3068> to Joshua,<WH3091> even Kiriath<WH7151> Arba,<WH704> named after the father<WH1> of Anak<WH6061> (the same is Hebron<WH2275>).
Caleb<WH3612> drove<WH3423> out the three<WH7969> sons<WH1121> of Anak:<WH6061> Sheshai,<WH8344> and Ahiman,<WH289> and Talmai,<WH8526> the children<WH3211> of Anak.<WH6061>
He went up<WH5927> against the inhabitants<WH3427> of Debir:<WH1688> now the name<WH8034> of Debir<WH1688> before<WH6440> was Kiriath Sepher.<WH7158>
Caleb<WH3612> said,<WH559> "He who strikes<WH5221> Kiriath Sepher,<WH7158> and takes<WH3920> it,<WH5414> to him will I give Achsah<WH5915> my daughter<WH1323> as wife.<WH802>"
Othniel<WH6274> the son<WH1121> of Kenaz,<WH7073> the brother<WH251> of Caleb,<WH3612> took<WH3920> it:<WH5414> and he gave him Achsah<WH5915> his daughter<WH1323> as wife.<WH802>

It happened,<WH935> when she came, that she had<WH5496> him ask<WH7592> her father<WH1> for a field.<WH7704> She got off<WH6795> of her donkey,<WH2543> and Caleb<WH3612> said,<WH559> "What do you want?"

She said,<WH559> "Give<WH5414> me a blessing.<WH1293> Because you have set<WH5414> me in the land<WH776> of the South,<WH5045> give<WH5414> me also springs<WH1543> of water.<WH4325>" He gave<WH5414> her the upper<WH5942> springs<WH1543> and the lower<WH8482> springs.<WH1543>
This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> according to their families.<WH4940>

The farthest<WH7097> cities<WH5892> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> toward the border<WH1366> of Edom<WH123> in the South<WH5045> were Kabzeel,<WH6909> Eder,<WH5740> Jagur,<WH3017>
Kinah,<WH7016> Dimonah,<WH1776> Adadah,<WH5735>
Kedesh,<WH6943> Hazor,<WH2674> Ithnan,<WH3497>
Ziph,<WH2128> Telem,<WH2928> Bealoth,<WH1175>
Hazor<WH2674> Hadattah,<WH2675> Kerioth<WH7152> Hezron<WH2696> (the same is Hazor<WH2674>),
Amam,<WH538> Shema,<WH8090> Moladah,<WH4137>
Hazar Gaddah,<WH2693> Heshmon,<WH2829> Beth Pelet,<WH1046>
Hazar Shual,<WH2705> Beersheba,<WH884> Biziothiah,<WH964>
Baalah,<WH1173> Iim,<WH5864> Ezem,<WH6107>
Eltolad,<WH513> Chesil,<WH3686> Hormah,<WH2767>
Ziklag,<WH6860> Madmannah,<WH4089> Sansannah,<WH5578>
Lebaoth,<WH3822> Shilhim,<WH7978> Ain,<WH5871> and Rimmon.<WH7417> All the cities<WH5892> are twenty-nine,<WH6242> <WH8672> with their villages.<WH2691>
In the lowland,<WH8219> Eshtaol,<WH847> Zorah,<WH6881> Ashnah,<WH823>
Zanoah,<WH2182> En Gannim,<WH5873> Tappuah,<WH8599> Enam,<WH5879>
Jarmuth,<WH3412> Adullam,<WH5725> Socoh,<WH7755> Azekah,<WH5825>
Shaaraim,<WH8189> Adithaim<WH5723> and Gederah<WH1449> (or Gederothaim<WH1453>); fourteen<WH702> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Zenan,<WH6799> Hadashah,<WH2322> Migdal Gad,<WH4028>
Dilean,<WH1810> Mizpeh,<WH4708> Joktheel,<WH3371>
Lachish,<WH3923> Bozkath,<WH1218> Eglon,<WH5700>
Cabbon,<WH3522> Lahmam,<WH3903> Chitlish,<WH3798>
Gederoth,<WH1450> Beth Dagon,<WH1016> Naamah,<WH5279> and Makkedah;<WH4719> sixteen<WH8337> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Libnah,<WH3841> Ether,<WH6281> Ashan,<WH6228>
Iphtah,<WH3316> Ashnah,<WH823> Nezib,<WH5334>
Keilah,<WH7084> Achzib,<WH392> and Mareshah;<WH4762> nine<WH8672> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Ekron,<WH6138> with its towns<WH1323> and its villages;<WH2691>
from Ekron<WH6138> even to the sea,<WH3220> all that were by<WH3027> the side of Ashdod,<WH795> with their villages.<WH2691>

Ashdod,<WH795> its towns<WH1323> and its villages;<WH2691> Gaza,<WH5804> its towns<WH1323> and its villages;<WH2691> to the brook<WH5158> of Egypt,<WH4714> and the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> with its coastline.<WH1366>
In the hill country,<WH2022> Shamir,<WH8069> Jattir,<WH3492> Socoh,<WH7755>
Dannah,<WH1837> Kiriath Sannah<WH7158> (which is Debir<WH1688>),
Anab,<WH6024> Eshtemoh,<WH851> Anim,<WH6044>
Goshen,<WH1657> Holon,<WH2473> and Giloh;<WH1542> eleven<WH259> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Arab,<WH694> Dumah,<WH1746> Eshan,<WH824>
Janim,<WH3241> Beth Tappuah,<WH1054> Aphekah,<WH664>
Humtah,<WH2547> Kiriath Arba<WH7153> (the same is Hebron<WH2275>), and Zior;<WH6730> nine<WH8672> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Maon,<WH4584> Carmel,<WH3760> Ziph,<WH2128> Jutah,<WH3194>
Jezreel,<WH3157> Jokdeam,<WH3347> Zanoah,<WH2182>
Kain,<WH7014> Gibeah,<WH1390> and Timnah;<WH8553> ten<WH6235> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Halhul,<WH2478> Beth Zur,<WH1049> Gedor,<WH1446>
Maarath,<WH4638> Beth Anoth,<WH1042> and Eltekon;<WH515> six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Kiriath Baal<WH7154> (the same is Kiriath Jearim<WH7157>), and Rabbah;<WH7237> two<WH8147> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
In the wilderness,<WH4057> Beth Arabah,<WH1026> Middin,<WH4081> Secacah,<WH5527>
Nibshan,<WH5044> the City of Salt,<WH5898> and En Gedi;<WH5872> six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>

As for the Jebusites,<WH2983> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> couldn't<WH3201> drive them out;<WH3423> but the Jebusites<WH2983> live<WH3427> with the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> at Jerusalem<WH3389> to this day.<WH3117>
